typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.lti.bio.ie.OBOtation
typeDescription.description: Ontology annotation from Open Biological Ontology format file. Labels a word as having been found in the list of [Term]s contained in an OBO format ontology, as well as the name of the ontology file in which it was found.

featureDescription.name: OntologyFile
featureDescription.description: OBO format ontology file name in which the term is found.
